subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Families and Family Life
Autism
Gymnastics
Weight Lifting
lead_paragraph: For years, injuries plagued Melanie Roach, a weightlifter and Olympic hopeful. But her son’s struggles with autism have re-inspired her and yielded valuable perspective.
snippet: For years, injuries plagued Melanie Roach, a weightlifter and Olympic hopeful. But her son’s struggles with autism have re-inspired her and yielded valuable perspective.
